archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Application Component Solution Building Block
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
An application component that specifies the implementation, "Solutuion Building Block" (SBB). Solution Building Blocks (SBBs) define what products and components will implement the functionality. SBBs are product or vendor-aware.
An Application Component represents an encapsulation of application functionality aligned to implementation structure, which is modular and replaceable.
